markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=5119) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 252 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Your study of magic allows you to instinctively sense its presence. You can cast 1st-rank detect magic at will as an arcane innate spell. If you’re a master in Arcana, the spell is heightened to 3rd rank; if you’re legendary, it is heightened to 4th rank.
name: Arcane Sense
